romance_dawn_arc.name: Romance Dawn Arc
romance_dawn_arc.description: The beginning of Luffy's journey to become the Pirate King.

orange_town_arc.name: Orange Town Arc
orange_town_arc.description: Luffy and Zoro meet Nami in a town taken over by the pirate Buggy.

syrup_village_arc.name: Syrup Village Arc
syrup_village_arc.description: The crew helps Usopp defend his village from the Black Cat Pirates.

baratie_arc.name: Baratie Arc
baratie_arc.description: The crew meets Sanji and faces the pirate Don Krieg.

arlong_park_arc.name: Arlong Park Arc
arlong_park_arc.description: The crew fights the fish-man Arlong to free Nami's village.

loguetown_arc.name: Loguetown Arc
loguetown_arc.description: The crew visits Loguetown, where Gol D. Roger was executed, and faces Captain Smoker.

reverse_mountain_arc.name: Reverse Mountain Arc
reverse_mountain_arc.description: The crew enters the Grand Line through Reverse Mountain.

whiskey_peak_arc.name: Whiskey Peak Arc
whiskey_peak_arc.description: The crew arrives at Whiskey Peak, a town of bounty hunters.

little_garden_arc.name: Little Garden Arc
little_garden_arc.description: The crew visits an island of giants and fights Baroque Works agents.

drum_island_arc.name: Drum Island Arc
drum_island_arc.description: The crew visits Drum Island to find a doctor for Nami and recruits Chopper.

alabasta_arc.name: Alabasta Arc
alabasta_arc.description: The crew helps Vivi save her kingdom from Crocodile and Baroque Works.

jaya_arc.name: Jaya Arc
jaya_arc.description: The crew visits Jaya Island and learns about the Sky Island, Skypiea.

skypiea_arc.name: Skypiea Arc
skypiea_arc.description: The crew visits the Sky Island Skypiea and fights the self-proclaimed god Enel.

long_ring_long_land_arc.name: Long Ring Long Land Arc
long_ring_long_land_arc.description: The crew participates in the Davy Back Fight with the Foxy Pirates.

water_7_arc.name: Water 7 Arc
water_7_arc.description: The crew arrives at Water 7 to repair their ship and encounters the secret organization CP9.

enies_lobby_arc.name: Enies Lobby Arc
enies_lobby_arc.description: The crew invades Enies Lobby to rescue Robin from CP9.

thriller_bark_arc.name: Thriller Bark Arc
thriller_bark_arc.description: The crew encounters the warlord Gecko Moria and his zombie army on the haunted island ship Thriller Bark.

sabaody_archipelago_arc.name: Sabaody Archipelago Arc
sabaody_archipelago_arc.description: The crew arrives at the Sabaody Archipelago and encounters powerful enemies and allies.

amazon_lily_arc.name: Amazon Lily Arc
amazon_lily_arc.description: Luffy lands on the island of Amazon Lily and meets Boa Hancock.

impel_down_arc.name: Impel Down Arc
impel_down_arc.description: Luffy infiltrates Impel Down to rescue his brother Ace.

marineford_arc.name: Marineford Arc
marineford_arc.description: Luffy and his allies battle to save Ace from execution at Marineford.

post_war_arc.name: Post-War Arc
post_war_arc.description: After the war, the Straw Hats train for two years to prepare for the New World.

return_to_sabaody_arc.name: Return to Sabaody Arc
return_to_sabaody_arc.description: The Straw Hats reunite after two years and prepare to enter the New World.

fishman_island_arc.name: Fishman Island Arc
fishman_island_arc.description: The Straw Hats journey to Fishman Island and battle the New Fishman Pirates.

punk_hazard_arc.name: Punk Hazard Arc
punk_hazard_arc.description: The Straw Hats visit the island of Punk Hazard and uncover Caesar Clown's experiments.

dressrosa_arc.name: Dressrosa Arc
dressrosa_arc.description: The Straw Hats and their allies confront Doflamingo in Dressrosa to free the island from his tyranny.

zou_arc.name: Zou Arc
zou_arc.description: The Straw Hats visit the elephant island Zou and learn about the Road Poneglyphs.

whole_cake_island_arc.name: Whole Cake Island Arc
whole_cake_island_arc.description: The Straw Hats infiltrate Big Mom's territory to rescue Sanji and retrieve a Road Poneglyph.

wano_country_arc.name: Wano Country Arc
wano_country_arc.description: The Straw Hats and their allies attempt to liberate Wano Country from Kaido and Orochi's rule.
